item.title: Chicago churches urge calm resistance to expected federal intervention
item.description: Churches citywide are turning up their response from the pulpit.

item.title: Florida's plan to drop school vaccine rule won't start for 90 days, won't cover all diseases
item.description: Florida has a plan to drop school vaccine mandates

item.title: Trump's US Open visit sparks boos and long security lines
item.description: President Donald Trump attended the U.S. Open on Sunday, drawing boos from the crowd

item.title: Carlos Alcaraz beats rival Jannik Sinner at the U.S. Open for a 6th Slam title and the No. 1 ranking
item.description: Carlos Alcaraz has reasserted his superiority over Jannik Sinner with a 6-2, 3-6, 6-1, 6-4 victory in the U.S. Open final

item.title: Carlos Alcaraz beats rival Jannik Sinner at the U.S. Open for a 6th Grand Slam tile
item.description: Carlos Alcaraz beats rival Jannik Sinner at the U.S. Open for a 6th Grand Slam title and No. 1 ranking
